title: Meta LLaMA 4 Maverick
description: Send a prompt to the LLaMA 4 Maverick model. It supports an optional session.

response.response: Artificial intelligence is a field of computer science focused on creating systems that can perform tasks that typically require human intelligence.

curl: curl -X POST https://matic.eu.org/api/llama -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"prompt": "What is artificial intelligence?"}'
